  • Building a categories/ tags page for Jekyll blogs

    Finding out how to build a Jekyll categories/ tags page can be a difficult task. This article will show you one of the (probably) easiest & quickest ways to achieve this. It relies on URL parameters and a tiny bit of basic Javascript. It isn't the cleanest solution, especially if you have a large amount of blog posts, but hey... it works! And the great thing is you only need one page for all your tags/ categories.
